data.title: Dell - Amazing Stats and Facts
data.meta_description: Dell is an American multinational computer technology company that develops, sells, repairs, and supports computers and related products and services.
data.meta_site_name: HelloLeads Blog - Simple Lead Management Software
data.text:
What does Dell do: Dell is an American multinational computer technology company that develops, sells, repairs, and supports computers and related products and services. The company operates across three business units: Infrastructure Solutions Group (ISG), Client Solutions Group (CSG), and VMware.

Dell Launch year: 1984

Company Name: Dell Technologies.

Dell Head quarters: Texas, US

Dell Founder: Michael Dell

Total Number of Dell employees: 157,000

How many manufacturing location does Dell have: 25 manufacturing locations

Key Dell Subsidiary: VMware, SecureWorks

Dell revenue: USD 92.15 billion

Total number of Dell patents: 27,234 patents and patent applications

Dell products are available in markets: Laptops, PCs and Monitors, Servers, Networking, Data storage, Data Protection, Converged Infrastructure, Hyperconveraged Infrastructure.

Customer support: Dell has nearly 2 billion interactions with it’s customers every year.

Product deliverability: Dell ships on average 140,000 systems per day- more than a system per second

Number of small and medium-sized businesses Dell serves: over 10 million

Annual eCommerce visits to Dell: 500 million

Dell research and development centers globally: 14

What makes Dell interesting: Dell has become popular among millennials for its sleeker models, improved features and design

Top 5 Competitors or similar products: HP, Lenovo, IBM, Acer, and Samsung

Awards: Best Employers for New Grads 2020 and America’s Best Employers by State 2020

Share this blog :
